body:

title: ban for no reason

replies.body: Hola, parece como si estuviera prohibido por aura kill, envíe un correo electrónico sobre su prohibición de apelación support@avicus.net
replies.body_tagged: Hola, parece como si estuviera prohibido por aura kill, envíe un correo electrónico sobre su prohibición de apelación support@avicus.net

replies.body:
Hello THE_KILLER1015,

I know you are distressed about being banned, however creating a forum thread does not help your situation. If you would like to be unbanned, please email support@avicus.net and the Senior Staff will review it.

If the appeal is deemed sufficient, you'll be unbanned.

Thanks for your time.

Locking.
